alert.note: Alert for Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Houston and west central Early Counties through 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/... At 413 PM EDT/313 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ashford to near Taylor. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Dothan, Taylor, Ashford, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Rehobeth, Avon, Gordon, Memphis, Pansey, Sigma, Enon, Wilson Mill, Barber, Keytons, Farley Nuclear Plant, Smyrna and Pearce. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
